data.label: 腾讯云实时音视频
data.description: 腾讯实时音视频（Tencent Real-Time Communication，TRTC），将腾讯 21 年来在网络与音视频技术上的深度积累，以多人音视频通话和低延时互动直播两大场景化方案，通过腾讯云服务向开发者开放，致力于帮助开发者快速搭建低成本、低延时、高品质的音视频互动解决方案。

data.label: Tencent Cloud Real-time Audio and Video
data.description: Tencent Real-Time Communication (TRTC) brings Tencent's deep accumulation in network and audio-video technology over 21 years, offering developers open access to low-cost, low-latency, high-quality audio-video interactive solutions through Tencent Cloud services, with two major scenario solutions for multi-person audio-video calls and low-latency interactive live streaming.
